audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear functional optimization - dramatically increased production capacity (30 to 1,000 units/month) through AI and automation. This is optimizing existing manufacturing processes, highly replicable pattern for biotech/pharma production.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization (Moderna), specific quantified metrics (30 to 1,000 units), direct quote from company source. Very credible evidence.
audited_claims.notes: Excellent Tier 1 case - clear production optimization with dramatic quantified improvement

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Describes acceleration of development processes, which is functional optimization. Pattern is replicable across pharmaceutical R&D.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization but lacks specific metrics. Claims 'speed up development' without quantifying the improvement. Source appears credible but vague on details.
audited_claims.notes: Strategic fit is clear but evidence lacks specificity - no timeline comparisons or quantified acceleration metrics

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Workforce augmentation through custom AI tools across business functions. Clear efficiency optimization pattern, highly replicable across knowledge work organizations.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization, specific metric (750 GPTs), concrete examples (dose selection, contract scanning), credible source.

apqc_functions.name: Develop and manage enterprise-wide knowledge management (KM) capability

audited_claims.notes: Strong Tier 1 case showing systematic workforce augmentation with specific tools and applications

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Optimizes existing dose selection process by processing large datasets more efficiently. Clear functional improvement, replicable pattern for data-intensive decision making in pharma.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization, specific process described (Dose ID GPT), clear value proposition (optimal recommendations from thousands of pages), credible source.

apqc_functions.name: Develop and manage enterprise-wide knowledge management (KM) capability

audited_claims.notes: Clear process optimization with specific tool and measurable output improvement

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Describes productivity improvement to support pipeline goals, which is functional optimization. Pattern is replicable.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization and specific goal (15 products in 5 years) but productivity claims are not quantified. 'Boost productivity' is vague without metrics.

apqc_functions.name: Manage employee onboarding, training, and development

audited_claims.notes: Strategic intent is clear but lacks specific productivity metrics or measurable improvements

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Describes platform capability for rapid medicine creation, which could be process optimization. However, this is more about platform characteristics than specific AI-driven improvements.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization but claim is general about mRNA platform capabilities rather than specific AI optimization. COVID vaccine example provides some context but lacks specific metrics.
audited_claims.notes: More about inherent platform capabilities than specific AI optimization - borderline relevance for Tier 1

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear process optimization - reducing delivery time from months to weeks through digital platform. Highly replicable pattern for manufacturing and delivery optimization.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization, specific timeframe improvement (months to weeks), describes concrete process (high-throughput production facility), credible source.
audited_claims.notes: Strong Tier 1 case with clear timeline improvement and process optimization

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Optimizes computational resource allocation for parallel processing, enabling more efficient R&D operations. Clear functional improvement, replicable pattern for computational-intensive processes.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization, specific capability described (flexible computational capacity, parallel design), clear operational benefit, credible source.
audited_claims.notes: Clear IT infrastructure optimization enabling improved R&D throughput

tier_verification: Correctly classified as tier 1. All claims describe optimization of existing functions (manufacturing, R&D, knowledge work) rather than business model innovation. Focus is on efficiency, speed, and capacity improvements within established processes.
